[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/inherit/craft_skills.c

This is an inheritable file to deal with the more dynamic nature of craft skills. So we can add in new ones without disturbing the balance everything.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Thu Nov 11 18:51:01 PST 1999

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/skills.h

Method index

query_crafts_skill_tree()
This method returns the craft skill tree.

These are functions that everyone can access.

the crafts skill tree.
